level.heading: Appointment of Director.
level.text: The Department shall be headed by a Director, who shall:
Be appointed by the Mayor with the advice and consent of the Council, pursuant to ยง 1-523.01(a);
Be qualified by experience and training to carry out the purposes of the Department as set forth in ยง 7-771.03; and
Serve at the pleasure of the Mayor.
